By utilizing specific lineage verification methods, you can rule out certain bloodlines based on the observed outcomes. Here, we explore four prominent sorcerer bloodlines and explain the methods used to verify lineage, along with interpretations of outcomes to facilitate accurate heritage identification.

1. **Starfall Heritage**
